attributes.action: Reinstate the free veterinary prescriptions for pets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently veterinary surgeries charge exhorbitant fees for drugs, in some cases more than twice the price these can be obtained through the internet.  Vets have now begun to charge for prescriptions in line with this Government lifting the ban on charging, leaving consumers in a trapped position of having either to pay for massively over-priced drugs, or buying from the internet AND having to pay a vet extra costs

rejection.details:
There are several petition in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/newvetcharges/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
